data.text: @goodbyejehovah Excellent advice. Other things which helped me were: learn about making resume/cv, read up on job interview skills, learn about a rental applications and paying bills. These are really basic things but necessary for survival if you are suddenly loving away from home.
@DSchneiderGagne That's amazing ❤️ I'm glad you made it.

@goodbyejehovah It's not easy and my heart goes out to you. I knew I wanted to leave at 14, but didn't run away until 17. Life was difficult for a while, but I made it. I'm 28 years free with a family of my own.
@bbqtexican Wow! Thank you. I will pass this along.
@goodbyejehovah I have a video on this exact topic planned for this week’s stream. Still working on the downloadable guide to accompany it. https://t.co/L18oUuOGC4
@goodbyejehovah Beautifully written. It is exactly as you describe it. Prepare yourself and then take the big important step. Leaving the org has been designed to be as hard and hurtful as possible
